data.name: 0002 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's about yesterday at the café.

data.name: 0003 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi's ears perked up when she heard "unnatural phenomenon".

data.name: 0005 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: "Tomorrow morning, we'll meet at school! Bring whatever you need for staying the night!"

data.name: 0004 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She stole my phone, and after interrogating Taniguchi...

data.name: 0007 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, I'm again bringing an unwanted bonus with me.

data.name: 0008 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry, I'm a little late.

data.name: 0009 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon! You're late!

data.name: 0010 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Didn't I tell you that anyone who's late gets the death penalty?!

data.name: 0011 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're really going to get it for keeping your Brigade Leader waiting in the burning sun!

data.name: 0012 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The death penalty for being just five minutes late, you say?

data.name: 0014 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Incidentally, the rest of the group is already assembled. As always.

data.name: 0015 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They're all genuinely incredible when it comes to following orders with room to spare.

data.name: 0017 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Sorry to keep you waiting, Asahina. Oh, you too, Nagato.

data.name: 0018 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay Kyon, prepare yourself!

data.name: 0019 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First, we'll drag you around the school grounds, then we'll chop your head off!

data.name: 0020 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi, I'll let you do the execution.

data.name: 0021 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is an honor.

data.name: 0022 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ……You call that an honor?

data.name: 0025 (361.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ehehe, morning!

data.name: 0000 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With that being said, it was the next morning.

data.name: 0001 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's summer break, and yet I've come to school. Brigade leader's orders, of course.

data.name: 0006 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Since she ordered us to, I woke up early and began the stupidly long climb up to school.

data.name: 0013 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't you know our ancestor's great proverb, "hate the sin, not the sinner"?

data.name: 0016 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But, she's not wrong. It's only morning, but these harsh rays of sun are hard to endure.

data.name: 0044 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh, Nagato, good morning.

data.name: 0045 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's unusual to be greeted by Nagato.

data.name: 0047 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We hardly talked at the Café yesterday, after all.

data.name: 0048 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How has your summer holiday been, Nagato? Have you gone anywhere?

data.name: 0049 (361.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Reading. Going out isn't scheduled.

data.name: 0050 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I-Is that so…… Sounds good.

data.name: 0051 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief…… Everyone's as usual it seems.

data.name: 0053 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: By the way, Kyon.

data.name: 0054 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What is it now?

data.name: 0056 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's no excuse for your lateness.

data.name: 0057 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Tsk. I was hoping otherwise.

data.name: 0059 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Now now, Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0061 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, you can't effectively run things using punishment alone.

data.name: 0062 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: So in this case, perhaps we should impose a reasonable amount of labor, wouldn't you say?

data.name: 0063 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nice, Koizumi! I'll use that idea!

data.name: 0064 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey now……

data.name: 0026 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: My, if it isn't little sister!

data.name: 0027 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The unwanted extra stuck its head out from behind me and gave a carefree introduction.

data.name: 0028 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As soon as she heard about this, she threw a tantrum insisting she was also coming.

data.name: 0029 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I tried whatever I could, but I couldn't convince her to stay behind.

data.name: 0030 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Clinging to my leg is one thing, but I'm not sure about the biting…

data.name: 0031 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And well, with the bear trap strongly clamped around my leg…

data.name: 0032 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I rushed to meet the group at school.

data.name: 0033 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Besides, if my little sister's here it seems unlikely Haruhi would do anything too absurd.

data.name: 0034 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm not going to deny I was thinking that.

data.name: 0036 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Hello.

data.name: 0038 (361.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ah, Mikuru's here!

data.name: 0039 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: My little sister clinging to my leg stared at nothing but Asahina's beauty.

data.name: 0040 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Luckily you're my sister. Were you my brother, you wouldn't wake up until summer ends.

data.name: 0066 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Get to it!

data.name: 0068 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What's more, that's six people's luggage. You're telling one person to take all of that?

data.name: 0070 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I-I'll also take my own.

data.name: 0072 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, you lot don't need to hold back… Well, whatever.

data.name: 0073 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You can hold on to just mine and little sister's.

data.name: 0074 (361.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hold it tight, Kyon!

data.name: 0075 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …… Good grief.

data.name: 0079 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey! I'm sure you know what'll happen if you go peeking inside!

data.name: 0080 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: As if I'd want to look in there.

data.name: 0081 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What am I supposed to do if once I open it I get dragged in by a tentacle monster?

data.name: 0082 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I wonder.

data.name: 0084 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ok everyone, go and put away your luggage, then we'll go straight away.

data.name: 0086 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's something we had to bring preparations for staying over for after all.

data.name: 0088 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It certainly seems we're staying over somewhere.

data.name: 0089 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I want to do my best to stop this from turning into trouble.

data.name: 0090 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It wouldn't surprise me if an accident happens.

data.name: 0092 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Anyway, we've already had lodging event with no prior information on the first day of summer.

data.name: 0093 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Summer holiday, sleepover, unnatural phenomena! What do these words lead you to?

data.name: 0094 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay, Mikuru. Answer.

data.name: 0095 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Um… Test of courage, maybe?

data.name: 0097 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nope, though I'll give you 20 points. Next is Yuki.

data.name: 0099 (361.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Ghost stories.

data.name: 0100 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You know a lot, right, Yuki? But I'll only give you 35 points. This time Koizumi can answer.

data.name: 0103 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Close, 70 points. Now, Kyon. We've come this far so you'd better get it right.

data.name: 0105 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even listening to the scoring she's giving out I don't have a clue.

data.name: 0106 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Incidentally, it seems the preparations she told us to bring was just for one night.

data.name: 0107 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On top of that, she told us to bring swimwear.

data.name: 0109 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are we going to have a swimming contest?

data.name: 0110 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No, of course not.

data.name: 0113 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: For example, the ghost of a student who drowned in a pool, regretting their short lived life.

data.name: 0114 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We can't rule out the possibility a ghost like that might appear, can we?

data.name: 0115 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't appear. I beg of you.

data.name: 0117 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are we going to camp?

data.name: 0118 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If we were going to camp, why would we gather at school?

data.name: 0119 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good point.

data.name: 0091 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At least let me get mentally prepared for it.

data.name: 0120 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, no points.

data.name: 0043 (361.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Good morning.

data.name: 0046 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wonder if there's something she wants to tell me.

data.name: 0055 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You can't use your little sister to trick me, you know.

data.name: 0060 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's true that punishments and rewards are important for commanding an organization.

data.name: 0065 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well Kyon, you can take all of our luggage to the clubroom, then!

data.name: 0067 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You're telling me to take all of this? Mine, Haruhi's, Asahina's, Nagato's……

data.name: 0069 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'll take my own.

data.name: 0078 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why is this so heavy… What could possibly be in Haruhi's bag?

data.name: 0085 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: When you say we'll go straight away, what did you call us out here to do in the first place?

data.name: 0087 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What trouble is Haruhi planning on starting?

data.name: 0096 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: B-But I'm not so good with that kind of thing, so…

data.name: 0102 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I wonder if it could be a mystery tour?

data.name: 0108 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Taking that into consideration…

data.name: 0111 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So why did you say swimwear was essential?

data.name: 0112 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Just in case. We don't know where an unnatural phenomenon might happen, after all.

data.name: 0116 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And with that, Kyon gets 5 points.

data.name: 0123 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why are we still missing 5 points despite being a correct answer? I need to know.

data.name: 0124 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You'd naturally figure it out eventually if you considered the meaning of the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0125 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: First of all, explain to me what this so-called meaning is.

data.name: 0127 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The meaning of the SOS Brigade is to search out the mysteries of our society.

data.name: 0128 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then, to have fun with the aliens, time travelers, sliders, and espers that we find!

data.name: 0130 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm trying to figure out if I'm sad that I can't say that, but it's reality.

data.name: 0133 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi, who worships Haruhi like a god, and the group of espers he is a part of.

data.name: 0134 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Such a group that calls themselves the "Agency."

data.name: 0136 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For better or worse, Haruhi herself is unaware of this and can't consciously control it.

data.name: 0137 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They dare say that if she becomes aware of her ability, the world will end.

data.name: 0138 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Of course I didn't believe such a dubious idea.

data.name: 0141 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It wasn't just Koizumi saying such odd things. The other two also.

data.name: 0143 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato, the humanoid interface for contact with organic lifeforms.

data.name: 0146 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina, who came from the future to observe Haruhi.

data.name: 0148 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They each revealed their true nature and circumstances to me.

data.name: 0151 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After all that, the insane event Haruhi caused.

data.name: 0152 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, I somehow managed to clear it, like a beginner adventurer from an RPG.

data.name: 0153 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thanks to that, I've developed a resistance to unnatural occurrences.

data.name: 0154 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't get surprised at all anymore.

data.name: 0156 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Ehhh!

data.name: 0121 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Surely you're not planning on doing another training camp, right?

data.name: 0122 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh my. Surprisingly for Kyon, a precisely correct answer. That's 95 points.

data.name: 0126 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What, you forgot already? Well, since it's a good opportunity, I'll explain it clearly.

data.name: 0129 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Then you've already accomplished that. Good for you, right?

data.name: 0135 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: According to them, it seems Haruhi has the ability to realize anything she desires.

data.name: 0139 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: However, in spring and summer, I saw more than enough to believe them.

data.name: 0149 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not to mention, I was forced into experiences that meant I had no choice but to believe them.

data.name: 0155 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: With that, we'll investigate the unnatural occurrences at the school until morning!

data.name: 0157 (361.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yay! A sleepover!

data.name: 0158 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait a second! Haruhi!

data.name: 0159 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I take back what I said before!

data.name: 0163 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's how it is. Well then, let's head out at once!

data.name: 0162 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What is how it is? Don't just accept what she says like that.

data.name: 0164 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Good grief. So, where to?

data.name: 0165 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The computer research society obviously.

data.name: 0167 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: I-Interviews……?

data.name: 0168 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Those guys seem to be staying over in their clubroom for the time being.

data.name: 0169 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Isn't that right? Koizumi.

data.name: 0170 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Quite. I've heard so too.

data.name: 0171 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When it comes to training camps, we did it first, so we win.

data.name: 0173 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This is the first I've heard that the earlier a camp is carried out, the better it is.

data.name: 0174 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So the computer research society is sleeping over, huh.

data.name: 0176 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't really have an interest in how people spend their summer vacation.

data.name: 0177 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I say that, but what about the SOS Brigade?

data.name: 0178 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How can I justify this pain of a brigade that doesn't even explain its activities properly.

data.name: 0179 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: That's what Suzumiya just explained, right?

data.name: 0181 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well whatever. For the time being I'll tell you in more detail as we go.

data.name: 0182 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you've got that, then let's go!

data.name: 0183 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief. ……Hm? Koizumi, you're also pulling the face of "good grief".

data.name: 0184 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's not the case. Just……

data.name: 0186 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's my fault? If you have a complaint, tell it to Taniguchi. He made the call.

data.name: 0187 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The computer club members are also at fault for having seen this unnatural phenomenon.

data.name: 0189 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Sorry for butting in!

data.name: 0191 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: My, quite the greeting.

data.name: 0192 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I-I didn't hear that you people's brigade are doing activities even in the summer holiday!

data.name: 0193 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm not obliged to tell you. Besides, the SOS Brigade's activities are always impromptu.

data.name: 0194 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd say it's a whim, but hey.

data.name: 0198 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Q-question?

data.name: 0201 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Confess!? What on Earth do you think you know!?

data.name: 0202 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I have my sources, and they know everything.

data.name: 0203 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's enough. Calm down, Haruhi.

data.name: 0204 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Uh, what?!

data.name: 0205 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm sorry about that, president.

data.name: 0208 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: You guys are as over the top as always.

data.name: 0209 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't help but share the sentiment in that regard.

data.name: 0211 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Wh-where on Earth did you hear such a……

data.name: 0212 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It doesn't matter where.

data.name: 0213 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: For now, just tell us all the details candidly!

data.name: 0214 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Uh…… right, I get it.

data.name: 0216 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: You understand her well.

data.name: 0218 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: M-me.

data.name: 0215 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Either way, I'm sure you won't leave until I tell you everything.

data.name: 0219 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Tell them everything. Then, we beg of you lot to leave immediately.

data.name: 0220 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's right. That seems to be the most wise method for us all mutually.

data.name: 0221 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, get on with it and talk!

data.name: 0222 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Every last little thing you remember.

data.name: 0224 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: It's time for investigation mode.

data.name: 0225 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: You can move Kyon by touching where you want to go with the stylus.

data.name: 0226 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: You can listen to what the club members have to say by tapping them.

data.name: 0227 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well done, Suzumiya.

data.name: 0228 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Phew……

data.name: 0230 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Yes, I'll do it straight away.

data.name: 0231 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After almost an hour of questioning, we returned to the literature clubroom.

data.name: 0233 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: According to them--

data.name: 0235 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They saw the impossible "Class 1-10".

data.name: 0236 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They heard the sound of a piano from an empty music room.

data.name: 0237 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In the night, the pool was shining eerily.

data.name: 0238 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't peer into the mirror in the entranceway at 2:22:22am.

data.name: 0239 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you do, a perfect duplicate of yourself will appear——

data.name: 0242 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What don't you like?

data.name: 0244 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now you mention it, I feel like you've said something like that before.

data.name: 0245 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What the members of the computer research society said doesn't all fit together.

data.name: 0247 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly. I wonder what's going on.

data.name: 0248 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I guess they've probably updated the story to keep with the times.

data.name: 0249 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: They're popular these days, remakes and such.

data.name: 0251 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And there's only four.

data.name: 0252 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you were going to make up a new seven mysteries, there's three missing.

data.name: 0253 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Unbelievable, that's just like those computer guys to make something half-assed.

data.name: 0254 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What a horrible way of speaking.

data.name: 0255 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Excuse me, I've brewed some tea.

data.name: 0256 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Thank you, Mikuru……

data.name: 0257 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: The pleasure is mine.

data.name: 0260 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina placed a cup on Haruhi's desk, and came to deliver tea to the rest of us.

data.name: 0261 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Kyon, here you are.

data.name: 0262 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Thank you very much, Asahina.

data.name: 0264 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: And Koizumi, here you go.

data.name: 0265 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Thank you very much.

data.name: 0266 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If I were to be selfish, I would've preferred a cool barley tea, but whatever……

data.name: 0267 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no way I can complain about tea Asahina made herself.

data.name: 0268 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hmmm, my tongue is burning.

data.name: 0271 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato took her hot teacup with both hands as usual, and casually took a single sip.

data.name: 0273 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …… Isn't that hot, Nagato?

data.name: 0274 (361.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Fine.

data.name: 0276 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's it!

data.name: 0277 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha!? Wh-what?

data.name: 0279 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thanks to that, I almost burned my lips on my tea.

data.name: 0280 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Found it! This! This!

data.name: 0281 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi pulled out a dust covered bundle of paper.

data.name: 0282 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What on Earth is that? Suspicious documents that got stowed away in some university?

data.name: 0283 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Of course not. It's an old collection of writing from the literature club.

data.name: 0285 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm sure somewhere in here……

data.name: 0287 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Found it. Here it is!

data.name: 0288 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What is it?

data.name: 0289 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Look, right here.

data.name: 0290 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm…… "The Man-eating Classroom"?

data.name: 0291 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Right. The story of a classroom that once you enter, you can never return.

data.name: 0293 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: On what basis can you make that claim? Please tell me.

data.name: 0294 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Once we've decided that, let's get straight to the investigation!

data.name: 0296 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: We will now explain the Haruhi meter.

data.name: 0298 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The Haruhi meter displays how much Haruhi's awareness is being…

data.name: 0299 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …diverted away from unnatural phenomena.

data.name: 0300 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The closer the meter is to the left, the more Haruhi is focussing on solving the mystery.

data.name: 0302 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …the speed at which Haruhi Suzumiya approaches abnormal spaces increases.

data.name: 0303 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: On top of that, a penalty will be added to your time limit, and the difficulty will increase.

data.name: 0304 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: As the meter goes right, Haruhi's attention is stolen by miscellaneous information.

data.name: 0306 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Depending on future choices such as "Who do I do the action with" or "What do I chose"…

data.name: 0307 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: … The way Kyon chooses to act will have an effect on the Haruhi meter.

data.name: 0308 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Try to lead Haruhi to think about things other than unnatural phenomena.

data.name: 0310 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The current "Haruhi meter value" is shown on the upper screen on the left hand side.

data.name: 0311 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If the meter starts heading to the left, please do what you can to return it to the right.

data.name: 0313 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: 1: Try to make Haruhi the topic of conversation as much as you can.

data.name: 0314 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: 2: When grouping, try not to leave Haruhi on her own, and preferably have Kyon join her.

data.name: 0315 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: This concludes the explanation of the Haruhi meter.

data.name: 0317 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Once again ignoring my question, huh?

data.name: 0319 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Tea?

data.name: 0320 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi stared at me, and grasped the teacup before her eyes……

data.name: 0321 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Glug, glug, glug, paaaah!

data.name: 0322 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She drunk it dry in one go. Not that I care, but aren't you hot?

data.name: 0325 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We investigated everyone especially, right?

data.name: 0326 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then go ask them! If you keep complaining the sun will go down!

data.name: 0327 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief……

data.name: 0328 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seems she won't be satisfied unless we've heard everyone's story……

data.name: 0331 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A strategy meeting? What on Earth are we going to talk about there……

data.name: 0335 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: What is it? Do you have some business?

data.name: 0336 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's not that……

data.name: 0337 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Somehow he seemed to have a bit of an attitude. Well, I suppose that's natural.

data.name: 0339 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm sure you're busy, but could I ask you about the unnatural phenomena?

data.name: 0340 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Even if I didn't want to, you lot aren't going to leave, right?

data.name: 0341 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Us lot, in other words Haruhi of course.

data.name: 0343 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hm? In other words, the president didn't witness the unnatural phenomena himself?

data.name: 0344 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even though he was staying in this room with the others……

data.name: 0345 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, might as well try asking the other club member for the time being.

data.name: 0347 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Do you still need something?

data.name: 0349 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I would've already told you if there was.

data.name: 0350 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: We'd all like you to leave as soon as possbile please.

data.name: 0351 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Hiding something……? It doesn't really appear so.

data.name: 0354 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Is it true that you experienced some unnatural phenomenon?

data.name: 0355 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Y-yes… There's no mistake.

data.name: 0356 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Exactly what kind of thing?

data.name: 0358 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: As I was walking down the corridor I felt a strange uneasiness……

data.name: 0359 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Uneasiness?

data.name: 0360 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Yeah, somehow the corridor felt longer than usual.

data.name: 0361 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It wasn't just…… in your head?

data.name: 0363 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Saw? What……?

data.name: 0364 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: "Class 1-10"!

data.name: 0365 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Class 10…… but there shouldn't be more than 9 classes in year 1……

data.name: 0366 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Of course I know that! But it was really there!

data.name: 0368 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Whether it's true aside, it's seriously affected this guy.

data.name: 0372 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'll talk to him again when he's calmed down.

data.name: 0375 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Excuse me……

data.name: 0376 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: ……Wh-what do you need from me?

data.name: 0378 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is it because of being up all night a few days, or the fault of unnatural phenomena?

data.name: 0379 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Do you mind if I ask you some questions?

data.name: 0380 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I was told you encountered some paranormal activity.

data.name: 0382 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You could hear…… that someone was playing the piano?

data.name: 0383 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: I went to check straight away!

data.name: 0384 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: But, no-one was in the music room……

data.name: 0385 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So you're saying the piano was making sound by itself?

data.name: 0386 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: Absolutely it was…… Yes, there's no mistaking it.

data.name: 0387 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You could hear the sound of a piano from an empty music room…… Right?

data.name: 0388 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, anything else……?

data.name: 0390 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no hope…… He's no longer got a grasp on reality.

data.name: 0391 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It doesn't seem like he'll tell me any more than that.

data.name: 0394 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Um, excuse me……

data.name: 0395 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: I need to sample it and compress it…… Yes, and sound effects……

data.name: 0396 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He's not listening……

data.name: 0400 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: What is it? I'm busy right now, you know.

data.name: 0401 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Just for a bit. I heard you lot encountered some unnatural phenomena……

data.name: 0402 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: Oh that……

data.name: 0404 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The pool was…… Shining?

data.name: 0405 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: Yeah, I was just here absentmindedly.

data.name: 0406 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: I didn't look from up close so I can't say concretely what it was though.

data.name: 0407 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: It was no normal light. I can say that for sure.

data.name: 0408 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't get on what basis he means "not normal" though……

data.name: 0410 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: It was just something I couldn't help. Besides, I have a lot of work to do at the moment.

data.name: 0411 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: Don't mean to be rude, but once you're finished with me I want to get back to my work.

data.name: 0412 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, yes. My bad.

data.name: 0414 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: Anything else?

data.name: 0415 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, no……

data.name: 0420 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: About unnatural phenomena!?

data.name: 0421 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Uh…… Y-yes……

data.name: 0422 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: Well asked!

data.name: 0424 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Mirror? What are you talking about……?

data.name: 0425 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: What do you mean "What"? The 2am mirror, of course! Uh? What? Don't you know about it?

data.name: 0426 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah……

data.name: 0427 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: If you look at the mirror somewhere in the school at 2:22:22am……

data.name: 0429 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh……

data.name: 0430 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Instead of unnatural phenomena, isn't this just a simple legend?

data.name: 0431 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: So, I was always investigating the location of that mirror……

data.name: 0432 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: But this time, I figured out it was the mirror in the entrance to the school.

data.name: 0434 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: Huh? What was it again? I heard it from someone, but……

data.name: 0435 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: I completely forgot. But, I heard it form a very reliable source!

data.name: 0436 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: R-right……

data.name: 0437 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Somehow that started to sound very suspicious.

data.name: 0440 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Once you start asking he doesn't seem to want to stop……

data.name: 0441 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's fine, it's nothing. You can get back to your work without worrying about it.

data.name: 0442 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: Really? If there's anything you want to ask, please ask anything!

data.name: 0443 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A-ah, understood. Thank you.

data.name: 0446 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When it comes to reporting this to Haruhi, just thinking about it gives me a headache.

data.name: 0447 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On the other hand, she's over there probably about to burst with anticipation, so…

data.name: 0448 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess I'll go report to Haruhi.

data.name: 0199 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Wasn't it supposed to be a witness investigation?

data.name: 0161 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. So that's how it is.

data.name: 0166 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're going to interview them on all the unnatural phenomenon they've witnessed.

data.name: 0172 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They're starting now, we're already on our second. They've been completely outpaced.

data.name: 0175 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Makes you wonder what they'll to be doing all night. Just looking at things on the internet?

data.name: 0180 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good pont. I probably should've recorded it for when other people ask.

data.name: 0185 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This time, it seems your poor choice of words is the cause.

data.name: 0190 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Huh! W-what!? What are you here for, you guys!?

data.name: 0197 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: More importantly, today we came to question you guys.

data.name: 0200 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll warn you that you can't try to hide anything! Confess clearly and honestly!

data.name: 0210 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We heard yesterday that the you all witnessed some unnatural phenomenon.

data.name: 0217 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Ugh…… It was… Who was it who saw something strange?

data.name: 0223 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Thus, Haruhi's witness investigation, or rather questioning, begun.

data.name: 0229 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That took a surprising amount of time, right? Mikuru, can you brew some tea?

data.name: 0232 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As for the so called unnatural phenomena, in total there were four things.

data.name: 0240 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Or whatever, this and that, nothing but questionable information. However……

data.name: 0241 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I really don't like it.

data.name: 0246 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It doesn't fit? As in, with the seven mysteries?

data.name: 0243 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Even though I investigated the seven mysteries of the school before.

data.name: 0250 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: In general, it's way too clichéd. It's not scary or anything at all.

data.name: 0258 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After responding, Haruhi thought deeply about something or another.

data.name: 0263 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I take cup from Asahina, which is so hot it seems likely to burn me.

data.name: 0269 (361.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: And Nagato, um, your tea……

data.name: 0278 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As soon as I realise she's stood up, Haruhi started searching around for something.

data.name: 0284 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What's that got to do with anything?

data.name: 0286 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ignoring my question, Haruhi single-mindedly flicked through the pages.

data.name: 0292 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This surely must be about the "Class 1-10" that the computer research society saw!

data.name: 0297 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The meter at the top of the screen is called the "Haruhi meter".

data.name: 0301 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: In this case, when you are later resolving the mystery…

data.name: 0305 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: You will receive a bonus on your resolution time, and the difficulty will decrease.

data.name: 0309 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: With doing so, you can cause the meter to move to the right side.

data.name: 0312 (361.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The basic method to moving the Haruhi meter to the right, is as follows:

data.name: 0318 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait, Haruhi, after Asahina made tea for you especially!

data.name: 0323 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Now we're sorted. Alright, let's go!

data.name: 0324 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nothing I can do. Maybe I'll drink it when I get back, but it's probably to cooling down by now.

data.name: 0330 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Then, let's return to the clubroom and have a strategy meeting. We'll be very busy!

data.name: 0338 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We did steal their computer on the first meeting after all.

data.name: 0342 (361.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Ask the person over there. I don't know any of the details.

data.name: 0348 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Even if you didn't witness anything, did you not notice anything strange at all?

data.name: 0357 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: It was right about this time of day.

data.name: 0362 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: In the beginning I thought so too, but…… I saw it.

data.name: 0367 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Nobody believes me when I tell them! I'm going crazy!

data.name: 0369 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It seems best to leave it here.

data.name: 0371 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Damn! Why does no-one belive me!

data.name: 0377 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Uh…… I don't know by what, but at a glance he looks like he's being chased.

data.name: 0381 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: I-indeed I could hear it! The melody from the empty music room!

data.name: 0389 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_B (部員Ｂ)
data.value: Y-yes. I have to record it…… If I don't do it quickly, "that" won't finish……

data.name: 0399 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Could I ask you a few questions?

data.name: 0403 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_C (部員Ｃ)
data.value: It was simply, in the middle of the night, around the pool I saw something shining.

data.name: 0409 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You seem to be quite calm. Very different to the other club members.

data.name: 0416 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can't get too in the way of his work……

data.name: 0419 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Excuse me, but could I ask you some questions?

data.name: 0423 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: The truth is, I always thought that mirror was suspicious!

data.name: 0428 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: A duplicate of yourself comes out of a mirror and changes places with you! That story!

data.name: 0433 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The entrance? How on Earth did you figure that out?

data.name: 0439 (361.ja) CLUB_MEM_D (部員Ｄ)
data.value: What's that? There's more you want to ask about? That's fine, ask away!

data.name: 0445 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, I've heard everyone's story, but…… I'll just say it as it is. I want to go home right away.

data.name: 0450 (361.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Go swimming

data.name: 0451 (361.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Go camping

data.name: 0452 (361.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
